Welcome to BI.TV – your vendor agnostic fortnightly recap of global Business Intelligence and analytics news, views and reviews.

 

Welcome to BI.TV – your vendor agnostic fortnightly recap of global Business Intelligence and analytics news, views and reviews.

 

There’s been a lot of talk about Big Data this past fortnight, and so that’s where we’ve focused our attention:

  • Story 1: “How The Gambling Industry Is Betting On Big Data”
  • Story 2: “9 Ways to Get Business Value from Big Data“
  • Story 3: “Five myths about big data”
  • Story 4: “Strategies for de-cluttering business intelligence dashboard designs”
  • Story 5: “3 Big Trends in Data Visualization”
  • Story 6: “Pain and Gain – the ROI of BI”
  • Story 7: “What – in your honest opinion – is the most valuable outcome or benefit of a successful business intelligence implementation?”

Can Big Data Help Save The Environment?

 

For best viewing, we recommend you watch in 720p resolution. Well, that’s it for another installment of BI TV.  We’ll catch you next time.
